com.dantann.recylerviewtemplate.framework

Class PhoenixSpinnerPreference<T extends BindableAdapter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Preference
      • com.dantann.recylerviewtemplate.framework.PhoenixSpinnerPreference<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - BindableAdapter that provides options for spinner

    public abstract class PhoenixSpinnerPreference<T extends BindableAdapter>
extends Preference
    Preference that contains a spinner for selecting different options. After selecting an option will result in restarting the app.
